title: This Week in Tech: New Ti Bikes From Sturdy, Cheaper Kogel Pulley Wheels, a Trek App, and a Vittoria Pressure Calculator
content:
For our latest this week in tech roundup we’ve got an oversized pulley wheel that’s affordable and a Sturdy Ti bike that doesn't take forever. There’s a couple of services too.

Read the full article at This Week in Tech: New Ti Bikes From Sturdy, Cheaper Kogel Pulley Wheels, a Trek App, and a Vittoria Pressure Calculator on Velo.
author: Josh Ross
